info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 01 at 7:05PM CDT until September 01 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN TEXAS...NORTHWESTERN HANSFORD AND NORTHEASTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 705 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northeast of Texhoma, or 17 miles southwest of Guymon, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Goodwell and Texhoma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
